Class CommandWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • CommandWords

  • public class CommandWords
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "Chunter Pac" application. "Chunter Pac" is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class holds an enumeration of all command words known to the game. It is used to recognise commands as they are typed in.
